article: I was walking around in a Big Bazar store doing a shopping, when I saw a Cashier talking to a boy who couldn't have been more than 5 or 6 years old. The Cashier said, "I'm sorry, _ you don't have enough money to buy this doll." Then the little boy turned to me and asked, "Uncle, are you sure I don't have enough money?" I _ his cash and replied, "You know that you don't have enough money to buy the doll, my dear." The little boy was still holding the doll in his hand. Finally, I walked _ him and I asked him _ he wished to give this doll to. "It's the doll _ my sister loved most and wanted so much. I wanted to gift her for her Birthday. I have to give the doll to my mommy so that she can give it to my sister when she goes there." His eyes were so _ while saying this. "My Sister has gone to be with God. Daddy says that Mommy is going to see God very soon too, so I thought that she could take the doll with her to give it to my sister." My heart _ stopped. The little boy _ me and said, "I told daddy to tell mommy not to go _ . I need her to wait until I come back from the mall." Then he looked again at the _ with sad eyes, very quietly. I quickly _ for my wallet and said to the boy. "Suppose we check again, just _ you do have enough money for the doll?" I added some of my money to his, without him seeing and we started to count it. There was enough for the doll and even some _ money. The little boy said, "Thank you God for giving me enough money! I asked last night God to _ I had enough money to buy this doll. He heard me! I also wanted to have enough money to buy a white rose for my mommy, but I didn't _ to ask God for too much. But He gave me enough to buy the doll and a white rose. " I finished my shopping in a totally different _ from when I started. I couldn't get the little boy out of my mind. Then I remembered a local newspaper article two days ago, which mentioned a _ man in a truck, who hit a car occupied by a young woman and a little girl. The little girl died right away, and the mother was left in a _ state. The love that the little boy had for his mother and his sister is _ , to this day, hard to imagine. And in a _ of a second, a drunk driver had taken all this away from him.
